wiki.summary: Chimera is ISA's debut full length, released April 20, 2018. It's a psychedelic progressive death metal concept album that takes the listener on a journey through the narrator's night of dreams. The tracks are designed to flow into each other, mimicking the organic flow of our nightly visions. Chimera was written between 2011 and 2014, and recorded during 2016-2017 by Dan Curhan in his living room. All music, lyrics, instruments, vocals, recording, mixing, and mastering done by Dan. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Chimera is ISA's debut full length, released April 20, 2018. It's a psychedelic progressive death metal concept album that takes the listener on a journey through the narrator's night of dreams. The tracks are designed to flow into each other, mimicking the organic flow of our nightly visions. Chimera was written between 2011 and 2014, and recorded during 2016-2017 by Dan Curhan in his living room. All music, lyrics, instruments, vocals, recording, mixing, and mastering done by Dan. Chimera can be streamed and purchased at ISA's bandcamp: https://dcurhan.bandcamp.com/album/chimera __ METAL INJECTION: "[ISA] meshes so many styles into one seamless flow; the overall quality is mesmerizing..." www.metalinjection.net/av/thinking-man-prog/the-thinking-man-isa-is-among-the-classier-heathens METAL TRENCHES | 8.7 out of 10 "The musicianship is on point, the approach is unique... [ISA] succeeds in creating 'music you could get lost in.' " metaltrenches.com/reviews/chimera-1453 GAMES, BRRRAAAINS, & A HEAD-BANGING LIFE | 9 out of 10 "an assault of death metal that threatens to melt minds with intense riffing and an absurd level of technical mastery" gbhbl.com/album-review-isa-chimera-self-released/ CADAVER GARDEN: "...mesmerizing to say the least... This offering has a great ability to steal you away from the world for its run time and let you bask in all of its technical, progressive and atmospheric glory... a mind contorting effort that sticks with you once you are done listening only for you to come back to experience it again and again." cadavergarden.com/2018/05/23/isa-chimera/ THE SOUND NOT THE WORD: "This is psychedelic, progressive death metal of the most intricate kind, with a huge range of dynamics, moods, and atmospheres. It’s a challenging listen; but one that’s very rewarding" thesoundnottheword.com/2018/05/24/review-isa-chimera/ TECHNICAL MUSIC REVIEW: " If you like spontaneity and progressive music that’s not of the norm ISA is a project that is for you." technicalmusicreview.com/2018/05/23/isa-chimera/ WONDERBOX METAL: "Whether it’s being atmospheric or aggressive, or usually some combination of both simultaneously, Chimera is a dizzying, dazzling monster" wonderboxmetal.com/2018/05/26/isa-chimera-review/ HEADBANGER REVIEWS: "stupendous... an incredibly layered listening experience that is as much a marvel of the style as much it is an assault on the senses" headbangerreviews.wordpress.com/2018/05/29/isa-chimera/ DEAD RHETORIC: "A thought-provoking look at dreams that is ripe for dissection at the technical level but with a constant purpose and feeling behind it." deadrhetoric.com/features/sifting-through-bandcamp-may-2018/ Read more on Last.fm.
